The user has expressed interest in movies related to war and political intrigue, with a preference for films featuring Ethan Embry and John Lee Hancock. Alternatively, for a different take on war and politics, "Hotel Rwanda" (2004) is a powerful drama based on the true story of a hotel manager who houses thousands of refugees during the Rwandan genocide. With a talented cast including Don Cheadle and Sophie Okonedo, this film is both emotionally charged and politically thought-provoking.
